member.name: M:Plugin.KeyChain.KeyChainImplementation.GetKey(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the key/password value from the keyChain.
member.returns: The key/password (or null if the password was not found in the KeyChain).

member.name: M:Plugin.KeyChain.KeyChainImplementation.SaveKey(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Same as SetKey(name, value), but it deletes any old key before attempting to save
member.returns: true, if key was saved, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Plugin.KeyChain.KeyChainImplementation.SetKey(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Save a Key (or a Password) to the KeyChain
member.returns: true, if key was saved, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Plugin.KeyChain.KeyChainImplementation.DeleteKey(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a key (or a password) from the KeyChain.
member.returns: true, if key was deleted, false otherwise.
